title: April Lunch Menu
lunchCost: PreK-5 = $2.65, Grades 6-8 = $2.75, Extra entree = $0.75, Milk is $0.40, Adult = $3.50

lunches.lunch: Pulled pork sandwich, Tater Tots, Coleslaw, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Mmmm, Pulled Pork and tots.

lunches.lunch: Chicken Nuggets, Pretzels, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: Yum, Nick Loves those.

lunches.lunch: Pancakes, Sausage Links, Orange Juice, Veggies & Dip
lunches.comment: Nice!  Breakfast for lunch, my favorite

lunches.lunch: Pasta with Meat Sauce, Breadstick, Salad, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Just like Olive Garden

lunches.lunch: Corn Dog, Baked Beans, Veggies & Dip, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Zach loves him some corn dogs.

lunches.lunch: Cheese Pizza, Animal Crackers, Fruit, Veggies & Dip
lunches.comment: Animal Crackers?  What, am I...2 years old?

lunches.lunch: Hamburger on a Bun, French Fries, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: What else would a hamburger be on anyway.

lunches.lunch: Walking Dead Tacos, Lettuce & Cheese Cup, Spanish Rice, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Yes, that's right, I said Walking Dead Tacos.

lunches.lunch: Creamy Chicken, Wild Rice Soup, Turkey Sandwich, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Make sure to tell your mom and dad, Happy Anniversary.

lunches.lunch: Sweet & Sour Chicken with Rice, Veggies, and Fruit
lunches.comment: That actually sounds kind of good.

lunches.lunch: Grilled Cheese Sandwich, Tomato Soup, Crackers, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Meh.

lunches.lunch: You ain't got no school that day, you'll have to make your own lunch
Hot dog on a bun, French Fries, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: Go Twins!

lunches.lunch: Pulled Pork Sandwich, Tater Tots, Coleslaw, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Alexa, give me some of your tots.  Get your own tots, gosh.

lunches.lunch: BBQ meatballs, Mashed Potatoes, Dinner Roll, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: I would take a cold lunch personally.

lunches.lunch: Cheese Tortellini with Sauce, Breadstick, Salad Fruit
lunches.comment: Just one breadstick?

lunches.lunch: Sloppy Joes, French Fries, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: That is the lunch of champions.

lunches.lunch: Chicken Chow Mein, Rice, Oranges, and a Fortune Cookie
lunches.comment: You had me at fortune cookie.

lunches.lunch: Chicken Noodle Soup & Crackers, Turkey Sandwich, and Fruit
lunches.comment: Chicken and Turkey in one meal?  Awesome!

lunches.lunch: Chicken Parmesan, Sandwich, Chex Mix, Veggie & Fruit
lunches.comment: Chicken Parm it tastes so good.

lunches.lunch: Bagels with Cream Cheese and Jelly, Cheese Stick, Veggies & Dip, Orange Juice
lunches.comment: I would definitely take this lunch.
